name: THE GROW RICH FOUNDATION TRUST
briefDescription: We introduce ourselves, The Grow Rich Foundation Trust, Non-Government Organization, registered under â€œThe Indian Trust Act" Registered as on No 126 of 2016 of Book IV at Kumbakonam.  The Grow Rich Foundation is a public charitable Trust that works to alleviate poverty through a unique integrated SOCIAL AND ECONOMIC community development approach through employment in   Agriculture, Non Agriculture, and fisher folk and allied Industry.The Grow Rich Foundation combines the key areas of Micro finance, Enterprise Development, Education and Training Development, IT, Health, Environment and E- governance, to address factors pertaining to social and economic development to rural areas.The Grow Rich Foundation provides training and support.
